Reviews.Title: She started using it right away!!!
Reviews.Author: T. Arce "Jersey girl"
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas present and she loved it!!!  She is driving us crazy taking pictures and posing for pictures herself

Reviews.Title: Like the product
Reviews.Author: susan lupien
Reviews.Content: It is so small, I am afraid to lose it! The product came promptly and well packed. The photos are fantastic and it is very easy to use.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.7-inch TFT color LCD with wide-viewing angle monitor
16.0 megapixel 1/2.3-inch CCD sensor
DIGIC 4 image processor for exceptional performance
5x optical zoom with 28mm wide-angle lens delivers stunning images
Shoot brilliant 720p HD video with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot A2500 16.0 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 16GB SD HC Memory Card + Point & Shoot Camera Case + Accessory Kit
